name: Sweep the Dice
description:
Game Intro:

An intense and exciting game of surviving from the graveyard of dice by cleaning up the dice monsters.

How to Play:

Kill the dice with a certain chance to get the dice they drop and roll to get powerful random skills and clean them quickly.

When at low health levels, you will not die immediately. Seize this time to kill random number of dice as soon as possible to recover from near death and continue the battle.

So, keep rolling the dice!

PS. If you're lucky enough, you roll to get a super skill to clean all dice on the stage. Push your luck!

Control:

WASD: Moving

Left Mouse Button: Normal Attack

Right Mouse Button: Throw the dice

Mouse: Define attacking/throwing direction

Creator:

Shitao Li (Program, Game Design)

Yihui Huang (Art, Game Design)

Enjoy~!
